channel.title: CVE Feed for wpmudev -- Hustle – Email Marketing, Lead Generation, Optins, Popups
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpmudev -- Hustle – Email Marketing, Lead Generation, Optins, Popups

item.title: CVE-2024-0368|2024-03-13T15:27:21.681Z -- wpmudev -- Hustle – Email Marketing, Lead Generation, Optins, Popups
item.description: The Hustle – Email Marketing, Lead Generation, Optins, Popups plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 7.8.3 via hardcoded API Keys. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including PII.
